meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family with purple flowers.
meanings.sent1: The selfheal plant in the garden attracted many bees with its purple blooms.
meanings.sent2: In the meadow, the selfheal added a beautiful splash of color with its flowers.
meanings.sent3: The selfheal plant seemed to be the favorite hangout spot for the garden insects.
meanings.sent4: The selfheal's purple flowers stood out like tiny jewels in the greenery.
